directions.text: Mix, 1 cup milk, yeast, white sugar, salt, egg, and 3 TBSP butter using a dough hook on low speed.
Slowly add flour till incorporated then increase the speed to medium.
Add flour or water until dough is a good consistency.
Let dough rise in a lightly greased bowl covered with a towel for 1 hour.
In a small bowl whisk the brown sugar and cinnamon.
Brush dough with ½ cup melted butter and spread cinnamon mixture evenly on top.
Slice dough into long 1 inch segments rolling them up as they are cut and placing in pan.
Let rolls sit and rise for 30 mins more.
To make glaze, mix ¾ cup milk with whipped cream, powdered sugar and pudding mix until thick.
